title: Interpretation of a dream about hugging in a dream

preview.html: Hugging Dream InterpretationIt depends on the events related to the dream, as it depends on who the person you are hugging in the dream is, so the best interpretation of this dream is to list all the details of the dream to interpret it correctly. You may also be interested in learning slavery in a dream, this is so that the meaning is revealed The real meaning of the dream or vision, as there are many different interpretations of hugging in the dream dictionary, as it is among the ambiguous activities where it does not only express feelings and love, as hugging in general is an activity that a person performs opposite to the person he trusts, so it is a closely related activity. Trustworthy, and in this article we discuss the interpretation of this vision according to what comes from the words of the imams of interpretation. You may also be interested in: Library in a dream Seeing hugs in a dream indicates the longevity of the dreamer, and also indicates his missing a close person due to his trip, death, or any other reason, And God knows best. Seeing someone you love hugging in a dream indicates that the relationship between the dreamer and the person he is embracing is stable, and that it is free of problems. All of this is done by the command of God Almighty, and He alone knows the unseen. Seeing a tight embrace in a dream indicates that the dreamer misses someone very close and that he will see him. Soon, and God knows best. Seeing someone hugging you in a dream proves that there is a close person who needs you very much and you know nothing about him, so look for your family and friends to support them. Interpretation of a dream about hugging in a dream and seeing a hug. Also, after we learned that there are many interpretations related to this vision, we learn about the interpretation of one of the dream interpreters, namely Ibn Sirin, one of the imams of interpretation who contributed more than others to establishing many rules. In the science of interpretation. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the dead person hugging the dreamer indicates the longevity of the person or the dreamer. God knows best. It is also nostalgia and some feelings buried in the mind of the dreamer. The husband embracing his wife shows his appreciation for her and his great respect for her wife. God knows best. The dream in which the fortuneteller hugs his girlfriend indicates The previous one in a dream indicates his desire to return. Seeing a woman hugging another woman also indicates that the dreamer has a mysterious and unclear personality. God knows best. The fortuneteller’s laughter while hugging someone indicates that the fortuneteller is going through a difficult time. A girl hugging a young girl also shows that she One of the lucky personalities in life. God knows best. It also indicates that he will find a way out in the near future. If a girl sees this vision, it means good news, which indicates her relationship with a good person, He will treat her well, God knows best. Likewise, if a girl sees this vision after praying Istikhara, it indicates that this person is suitable for her. You may be interested

title: Interpretation of a girl with brown hair in a dream: Seeing a woman with brown hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The brown-haired girl in a dream, who is married and the pregnant wife of Shirin’s son, gave birth to a dark-haired, brown-haired slave. Interpretation of a brunette woman in a dream: A woman’s skin color changes in dreams If the dreamer sees a blonde woman and talks to her, then he should know that he will be incredibly happy And whoever talks to the brown woman in the dream will be showered with good luck. On the other hand, a black woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enter into important and fatal events. A dark-haired woman usually indicates a new stage in life, and a blonde woman usually heralds a happy event. The meaning of seeing a woman and a girl in a dream. A woman in a dream is news of success, and a woman’s dream indicates a lack of free will. A woman wearing white is the sorrows that the dreamer avoids in his life. If the woman is She wears black, it indicates anxiety. A pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of prosperity. A dead woman is a sign of disappointment, and besides, a woman’s dream becomes an adornment of the world. If the dreamer talks to a woman in a dream, this indicates a new and fruitful friendship between them. If he quarrels with her, he will be sad, and the woman A fat woman in a dream is a sign of wealth. Whoever sees a beautiful woman in a dream, this indicates the money that he will obtain after a while. If a woman dreams of another young woman, this indicates her hostility in life. Seeing a fat woman in a dream indicates the fertility of the year, while seeing a thin woman It denotes the quality of the year, while the old woman symbolizes the loss of goodness, unless that woman adorns herself. If you hear that a group of women are looking at you and watching you, this is a sign that your enemies will not be able to resist you and that you will achieve your ambitions and they will not be able to do anything. If You saw in a dream that a woman is a good woman and is joking with you, this indicates a profitable year and the good things it brings you. A dominant woman in a dream indicates justice in religion and steadfastness in faith. If you dream that you are abandoning a woman and alienating her, this is a sign of losing blessings from Your life. But if this woman is of a high status, then this indicates the removal of difficulties. If you dream that a barren woman was able to become pregnant, then this is a dream that carries all the meanings of goodness, joy and comfort. If you dream that the woman in front of you has never seen before in your life and that you do not know her, and she is ugly, then this It means that you will miss some important things in your life. If it is beautiful, it carries meanings of comfort and achieving everything you aspire to. A blonde woman in a dream predicts a happy event. A brunette woman in a dream means a new stage in life. If a man dreams of a woman, this is a good omen for success. A woman’s dream means that you do not have a choice of free will. A dream for a woman wearing white: Avoids sorrows. Dreaming of a woman wearing black: anxiety. Dreaming of a pregnant woman: well-being. Dreaming of a dead woman is a sign of disappointment. Dreaming of a young woman is a world jewel Talking to a woman in a dream indicates a new and fruitful friendship. Disagreement with a woman in a dream indicates sadness. Dream

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about Eid al-Adha by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The most important interpretations given for seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream. Eid al-Adha is one of the Islamic holidays that is famous for slaughtering sacrifices. Muslims wait for it every year to enjoy the family atmosphere and positive energy that fills it. A dream about Eid al-Adha is one of the beautiful dreams that carry positive interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about Eid al-Adha. Seeing Eid al-Adha in a dream for both single men and women means that they are on the right path and there is no need to worry about their future, because this dream confirms that their coming days will be bright and filled with many successes, whether it is success. In their personal lives with their future husbands, or that success in their profession will become a profession or special success in their studies if they are in an educational stage of any kind, whether it is a school or a university. A dream about Eid al-Adha for the poor is a sign from the Most Gracious of a new dawn in his life in terms of paying his debts. And removing his poverty. When a girl dreams that she is watching Eid celebrations and rituals in her sleep, starting from the Eid prayer until the slaughter of the sheep or the sacrifice, then this dream indicates the arrival of great joy for the dreamer, and in most cases it will be. Joy, especially for her academic or professional future. If the dreamer sees this vision, it means that his life has been dark for years due to his problems with his family or some failures in his professional life, but God enlightens his life with comfort and removes all the adversities that marred his days. And make him miserable. In addition to losing his taste for the world, if the dreamer dreams that this dream should expect the support of the Most Merciful near him so that his tears will dry up over the years soon. This vision in a dream is one of the strongest indications of discovery after loss, so this dream is good news. For the fortuneteller, God will guide him to the right path through which he will find the precious thing that he lost years ago. He kept looking for it, but did not find it until he lost hope, but God will revive hope. This dream is a lifeline for anyone who committed adultery, theft, murder, and injustice to people and did not restore rights to his people. Because the vision means that the dreamer will radically transform from a corrupt man who practices forbidden and immoral acts to a pious man who prays in the mosque and helps the needy, and the dream indicates that God has opened his doors to those who want advice on repentance. One of the most prominent interpretations of this dream is patience, as Ibn Sirin said that this vision means That the dreamer was tested by God with patience in his life, knowing that this dream foretells to the one who saw it that patience is the key to comfort. May God spare her and grant her patience in her personal life and the hardships she endured. May God honor her with beautiful compensation for all the years of her patience. And if the dreamer perseveres in the sadness of poverty, God will compensate him with wealth and money that will suffice him for years to come. If you have a dream and do not find Its interpretation, so go to Google and type an Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of Eid al-Adha in a dream for a single woman. An ambitious single woman. If she dreams of this dream in her dream, the interpretation will be a wonderful place that the dreamer holds with all his strength and will not give up until God gives it to her, and through this she will feel that he is a strong person.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Alaq in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Alaq in a dream. In previous articles on the Moments website, we have dealt with many interpretations of dreams that many of you have and are searching for a suitable interpretation but cannot find. Today we will continue to publish a series of dream interpretations and we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Alaq in a dream in detail and in every detail. It carries connections and interpretations, and we will learn about the interpretations based on what was stated in the books of the scholar Ibn Sirin, the scholar Ibn al-Nabulsi, and other major scholars. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Alaq in a dream about the millennium. The pink millennium has come: and the son who dwells in goodness and destiny is of good conduct and righteousness. He who reads Surat Iqraa or Surat Al-Alaq In a dream or something like it, he is blessed with a good servant boy, and it is said: he is blessed with writing and submission. Only God knows. The interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Alaq in a dream. Whoever reads Surat Al-Alaq, may God have mercy on him, has knowledge and the Qur’an, or is eloquent in the language, or is a scholar, or is a worker, or is humble and charitable, or has a good and successful son, and is given sufficient livelihood. Bullying is said by a person. Whoever reads Surah Al-Alaq His strength was followed by writing, eloquence and humility. And whoever recites it in a dream or something like that, or if it is recited to him, he will be blessed with a child and will be a good servant. Read alsoInterpretation of dreams about catsInterpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Alaq by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams about a vision from Surat Al-Alaq by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees himself reading it He is blessed with writing, eloquence and humility. Interpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Alaq by Al-Nabulsi. As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted the dream of Surat Al-Alaq and said: Whoever recites it or has it recited to him will be blessed with a child and be a good servant. It was said: He learns the Qur’an, interprets it, and the person blackmails him. Interpretation of the dream of Surat Al-Alaq in a dream from Al-Ahsa. Whoever reads it, may God be pleased with him, knowledge. And the Qur’an, or eloquent in language, or knowledgeable, or work, or humble and loving in his behavior. Or he has a good and successful son who is very rich, and he was called human blackmail. We presented to you today through the “Moments” website the interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Alaq in a dream, If you have any questions or dreams looking for an interpretation, share your comments with us and our experts will answer them as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting a cake from someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting a cake from someone in a dream When searching for an interpretation of a dream about receiving a cake from someone in a dream, it is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader and should he prevent absolute disbelief because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth that he can make a mistake and be beaten, in addition to the fact that the site and its managers have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about getting a cake from someone in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he received cakes in a dream from a person may indicate that he heard happy news at that time, and God knows best. The dream of receiving sweets in a dream can indicate stability and family happiness for the dreamer. In the event that one sees that he received a piece of cake in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the dreamer during those days. In the event that you see a pulled cake in a dream, this may indicate the good things that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a hairpin in a dream Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a hair clip can indicate the abundant good that will come to his life in the coming period. The dream of receiving a stick of hair in a dream may indicate the end of the suffering that the dreamer suffered in the period Previous. If you see a hair stick in a dream, it may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer's life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he has pulled out a hair clip can indicate the happy events that will happen to the dreamer during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving a phone call from someone in a dream In the event that one sees that he has received a phone call from someone in a dream, this may indicate the high status that the dreamer has reached in his life at that time. In the event that one sees that he has received a phone call from someone else, this may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer during these days. Anyone who sees in a dream that he has received a phone call from someone else can indicate the happy things that are happening to the dreamer in his life at that time. A person's dream that he has picked up someone else's phone in a dream may indicate that he has overcome some difficulties that the dreamer was facing. Interpretation of a dream of getting sunglasses in a dream In the event that he personally sees that he has obtained sunglasses in a dream, this may indicate the happiness that the dreamer was enjoying at that time. In the event that one sees that he has taken sunglasses from someone, this may mean that he is hiding something important And hides it. Dreaming of someone wearing sunglasses in a dream can indicate the protection of children and fear for their future. It is possible that seeing getting sunglasses in a dream indicates that there are some secrets in the dreamer's life and he does not want to talk about them. Interpretation of a dream about receiving the Qur’an as a gift in a dream If one sees that he received a gift of the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate the positive changes that have occurred in the dreamer's life during this period. The vision may indicate

title: What is the interpretation of bees in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of bees in a dream is the topic that we will talk about in our article today, as bees are considered one of the most beneficial insects for humans, due to the production of honey that cures many diseases and benefits health, but there are those who worry if they see bees in a dream, so a variety of interpretations are necessary. Among the visions of bees in a dream in different forms, which we will present in the following lines in the encyclopedia. What is the interpretation of bees in a dream? Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of bees in dreams. Ibn Sirin says that bees in a dream generally symbolize successful business, good offspring, and plenty of sustenance. Whoever carries out a legitimate task and sees The dream of a bee, this indicates the success of his work. If one sees a beehive, his dream indicates that his home lives in a state of happiness and stability. The large size of the beehive in the dream indicates the abundance of goodness for the pioneer and that his wife gives birth only to males. Whoever believes that he has succeeded in Escaping from a palm tree attack, it means that his business will be a great success. Being stung by a bee in a dream is a sign of abundant nourishment, kindness, and blessing. When a single man sees that he is being attacked by bees, this is a sign of his imminent marriage. As for bees attacking a married man, this symbolizes To the presence of great wealth on his way to him. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever dreams that he is stung by a bee, this indicates that he will recover if he is sick. A bee sting also indicates the fulfillment of goals and dreams. And whoever sees that he is killing bees, his dream will appear. He will not succeed in anything he seeks. Seeing killing bees may indicate that the dreamer will get rid of an enemy. A single man who sees a bee attacking him is good news for his marriage. Seeing bees may indicate that the dreamer will get a promotion at work. Interpretation of one dream about beesIf a girl sees In her dream that there are many swarms of bees near her, the dream indicates that she will do well in her next life. Seeing a bee stinging an unmarried woman indicates the imminent fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. An unmarried woman seeing bees in a dream indicates that many Sustenance and kindness will come to her soon. A single woman’s vision of bees is considered an auspicious vision, because it means the nearness of her marriage. Honey bees in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes that she is characterized by nobility and high status. Interpretation of a dream about a married bee A married woman who sees bees in her dream indicates an abundance of goodness And live waiting for her. A bee in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in her life and enjoyment of marital happiness. If a married woman sees that a bee stings her in her home, her dream indicates that God will soon achieve what she wants. A bee in a married woman’s dream indicates her salvation from her problems and troubles. A married woman who sees bees in her dream is considered good news that she will become pregnant. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s vision of bees Interpretation scholars say that a pregnant woman who sees bees in her dream with happy eyesight is evidence of her giving birth in good health and safety for herself and her fetus. A bee in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of a bird entering the house in reality by the most famous scholars of interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of the bird actually entering the house, and according to the most famous interpretation scholars, individuals have many dreams related to animals and birds that we see in reality, including the bird, and in general, seeing it in a dream is a good thing. It is a praiseworthy vision, as it indicates goodness and nourishment for the dreamer, but it also includes other connotations and interpretations that vary according to the details we see in the dream, as well as the condition of the one who saw this dream, and in this article we will inform you of the interpretation of the bird entering the house in reality. Interpretation of the bird entering the house Reality Many of these interpretations are included in this dream, especially because they are considered positive and good connotations, as explained by scholars and interpretation experts, including the researcher Ibn Sirin, and here we learn more. The interpretation of the bird entering the house is a reality It is also: Ibn Sirin saw that seeing birds in a dream. It is It indicates that the fortuneteller is soft-hearted, loves to laugh and joke a lot. In addition, he likes to bring fun into the home environment. This vision is also an indication of the birth of males in the event that the dreamer’s wife becomes pregnant. But if one sees a bird being slaughtered in a dream, this is a sign of That a child with a weak personality will be born. He also needs his father’s love and support to become a strong and successful man. See also: Evidence for the interpretation of a dream of hearing or reading the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a bird entering the house for free. The interpretations included in this dream vary according to the social status of the viewer, as in the dream of a girl who is not For a married woman, it brings him good news and many signs, and here we are talking about it. The interpretation of the bird entering the house for free is also: This vision in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she will marry a wealthy man. She will fulfill all her dreams and live with him the most beautiful days of life. Also, this vision is A harbinger of success for visionaries in professional life. And they get a prestigious job with a large financial income. Also, you will reconcile home and work and there will be no shortage of parties. If you hear birds in the house, but you cannot see them. This dream is a sign that he will hear the happy news For a close friend. Or for this vision to be a sign of good morals for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream according to the most famous interpreters and its repercussions. Interpretation of a bird entering the house for a married woman. In a married woman’s dream also, this vision carries many interpretations that are not bad, but are positive indicators. And good, and in this context we inform you of that. The interpretation of a bird entering the house for a married woman. It is also: If a bird is seen in a dream, this is a sign of abundant goodness that the dreamer will enjoy in the near future. She will also feel blessed in her life, whether it is work or marriage. But if it sees The bird is red in color. Evidence of mutual love and respect between her and her husband. It also indicates her husband’s loyalty and good treatment of her. Birds falling from the sky onto the roof of the house are a good omen. They indicate that all of the dreamer’s dreams will come true and that God Almighty will bless her with her children. See also: I dreamed that I Pregnant in a dream, interpretation of pregnancy for a single woman

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous signs who excelled in the field of dreams and their journey, and for every vision or dream that Ibn Sirin interpreted, there are many signs, among them the interpretation of a dream of seeing the number 6. Seeing the number 6 in a dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as follows: It is the next good thing in the life of the fortuneteller. He interpreted it as immediate marriage and engagement or engagement for the bachelor. It was stated in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that seeing the number 6 indicates the death of difficulties and problems from the dreamer’s life. The number 6 also indicates success and progress in professional and personal life. The meaning of the number 6 In general, it indicates the happiness and goodness of the owner of this dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a single woman. Different viewpoints and interpretations of vision 6 differ in each case. We reported about the vision of number 6 for single women in many different signs and signs of the zodiac, including: It indicates Seeing the number 6 in one girl’s dream means getting rid of the pain and sadness that fills her life, which is the result of disputes and problems between her family. It also expresses relief and almost joy. She announces the nearness of her engagement to a young man who has a strong personality and status. The number 6 shows the happiness and psychological comfort that will fill her life. This girl. The number 6 in a single woman’s dream indicates that something will happen to her that will bring her happiness and joy. On the other hand, seeing the repetition of the number 6 and numbers containing the number 6 indicates many problems that will disappear soon. And the ease of solving these problems from it Without the intervention of another person. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing the number 16 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. As for a married woman, seeing the number 6, like the rest of the numbers that can be seen in a dream, indicates many Clues, including those that can be seen in the following points: When a married woman sees the number 6 and he has come to her in a dream, it has a wonderful interpretation of the trip. This trip is to get a lot of money to raise her standard of living. The number 6 in a married woman’s dream indicates Goodness coming to her from where she does not know. It represents the end of many problems that fill her family and her professional life. The number 6, when seen in a married woman’s dream, indicates the happiness of the life she lives with her husband and family. And her desire to remain in this state of happiness without causing It has no inconvenience. The appearance of the number 6 in a married woman’s dream is a sign of starting new business projects that will bring her more money. Interpretation of seeing the number 6 in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a pregnant woman: If the pregnant woman sees the number 6, she will have many signs and good news and the news will prevail for her The pleasant one. What we mention in the following points shows us these indicators. A pregnant woman seeing the number 6 in a dream indicates that she is in good health, and that it is easy to give birth and does not feel pain. Seeing the number 6 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her dreams will come true and the happiness that will come to her after Her birth. And the number 6,

title: Interpretation of seeing the Pleiades stars in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of stars in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said about seeing stars in a dream that it is good news and happiness. Interpretation of seeing stars at night Seeing stars shining at night indicates the strength of faith and sincerity of intention in God Almighty, as it indicates the fulfillment of a cherished desire or a response to the dreamer's supplication and his success. Interpretation of the movement of stars in the sky Seeing stars Movement in the sky in a dream indicates major changes that will occur in the country in general, and a historical event or something similar may occur. Interpretation of seeing stars shining in the sky Seeing bright stars in the sky in a person's dream indicates his high status and high position, and in a man's dream it indicates marriage to a virgin woman and the birth of males. Interpretation of seeing bright stars in a dream If a person sees bright and sparkling stars in his dream, this is evidence of a great benefit for people in general in the country. Interpretation of seeing stars in a dream for a single woman When a girl who has not yet married sees stars in her dream, this indicates the fulfillment of a cherished desire she has or the good news of marriage to an educated or great man in religion. Interpretation of stars in a dream for a married woman A married woman's vision of stars in her dream shows her children, and their condition in reality is a reflection of the condition of the stars in Dream. Interpretation of stars in a dream for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees stars in her dream, this indicates the birth of a male child and she will have a wonderful relationship. Interpretation of seeing falling stars in a dream Seeing falling stars in a dream means that you are facing challenges and obstacles in life and are exposed to fear and excessive tension that something will happen. Something happening and the stars falling to the ground is a reflection of the fear of poverty and the inability to meet one's financial needs. As for seeing stars as if they are falling on a person's head in a dream, this is evidence of his fear of illness, death, or something bad for him and he is facing problems in his life.

Interpretation of seeing stars at night: Seeing stars shining at night indicates the strength of faith and sincerity of intention in God Almighty. It indicates the fulfillment of a cherished desire or a response to the dreamer’s prayer and his success. Interpretation of the movement of stars in the sky. Seeing the stars. Movement in the sky in a dream indicates major changes that will occur in the country in general, and a historical event or something similar may occur. Seeing bright stars in the sky in a person’s dream indicates his high status and position, and in a dream For a man, this indicates marriage to a virgin woman and the birth of boys. Interpretation of seeing falling stars in a dream Seeing falling stars in a dream means that you are facing challenges and obstacles in life and are exposed to fear and excessive tension that something will happen. Something happens and the stars fall to the ground It is a reflection of the fear of poverty and the inability to meet one's money needs. As for seeing stars falling on a person’s head in a dream, this is evidence of his fear of illness, death, or something bad for him while he is facing problems in his life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a robe in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a robe in a dream. In previous articles, we have published many interpretations of dreams that many of you have and are looking for a suitable interpretation and do not find them to be unique and worthy of the Arab reader. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a robe by Ibn Sirino. Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin explained in his book The Great Interpretation of Dreams that the perception of the robe In a man’s dream, it is a sign for a woman. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing an abaya, it has shown him that he will marry a non-Arab woman. Seeing a colored or dyed robe indicates a change in the wife’s personality. As for looking at a cotton or silk robe, it symbolizes the woman’s morals and religion, and by God I know. Interpretation of a dream about Juba for a single woman. Concerning the unmarried girl and the importance of seeing her forehead in her dream, Ibn Sirin said that the unmarried woman who wears the abaya in her dream symbolizes her purity, chastity, and good morals, and this also applies to her purchase. Wearing a black dress embroidered with gold or silver symbolizes honor. And status among people. Seeing a white robe in a dream means prosperity, enormous wealth, or good luck. Seeing a green forehead is praiseworthy, as it portends a year filled with all goodness, desires, and wishes that will come true, God willing. It is not worthy of praise and hate. The vision of an unmarried woman in her dream is like taking off her robe in front of people or strangers, as it portends troubles, troubles, and troubles. The best vision is also the insight of an unmarried girl in her dream as if she is washing her robe. This vision portends a happy and important event or positive transformations in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dress for a married woman. For a married woman who sees in her dream that she is buying a new, beautiful, embroidered dress, and the visionary has a feeling of joy and happiness, this portends pregnancy soon, God willing. A married woman’s awareness of wearing a jumbo over her clothes symbolizes the jacket in the general sense, whether in health, money, or Gains or children. If the wife sees that she is wearing a red robe, this means that she feels intense love towards her husband. The best vision is to see the white and green robe, which symbolizes security, prosperity, prosperity and peace. It is undesirable to watch the wife’s forehead taking off in a dream, as it warns That she will lose, steal, or lose something of value to the woman. And to see the forehead guarding the wheel, or to see the closet full of veils, is generally good for the husband and wife, especially if the wife sees the forehead with a wide ambush, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a robe for a pregnant woman. As for the pregnant woman Its appearance does not change much from what was previously mentioned. The robe also portends safety and security for the pregnant woman and her fetus. The vision of a pregnant woman in a dream, as if her husband presented her with an embroidered white robe, heralds the birth of a female child. Some commentators believed that seeing a pregnant woman in a black robe portends a male child, and God alone I know. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a man’s robe. We have previously mentioned that seeing a robe in a man’s dream, whether he is single or married, symbolizes a woman and refers to her directly. If a single man sees a dress in his dream, this indicates the presence of a woman close to his heart or
